title: Use diagonals
text: Simplify the fraction diagonally. Split one term from the numerator of one fraction into the product of prime numbers. Do the same for the denominator of the other fraction.
speech: Simplify the fraction diagonally. Split one term from the numerator of one fraction into the product of prime numbers. Do the same for the denominator of the other fraction.
pacedSpeech: Simplify the fraction diagonally. Split one term from the numerator of one fraction into the product of prime numbers. Do the same for the denominator of the other fraction.

title: Simplify
text: Simplify diagonally, eliminating prime numbers. Then multiply the product together.
speech: Simplify diagonally, eliminating prime numbers. Then multiply the product together.
pacedSpeech: Simplify diagonally, eliminating prime numbers. Then multiply the product together.

title: Multiply
text: Multiply the two fractions together, multiplying the numerators together and the denominators together.
speech: Multiply the two fractions together, multiplying the numerators together and the denominators together.
pacedSpeech: Multiply the two fractions together, multiplying the numerators together and the denominators together.
